name: Exam Mottled
overview:
It is our experience that although technology has grown immensely everywhere, an average Indian student has seen only a few options to excel in studies. The two available options were to either attend a class or read study material including books at home. Although both these options have their own advantages, they do not help the student to effectively know his progress on proactive basis.

The books are highly static and they contain questions in a predetermined order. Studying only a sub set of these questions is not possible, leave alone the necessity of their random order to test oneself.

At a coaching class, the teachers are busy preparing for next lecture. A full lively interaction is only a promise in most of the cases and parents have no other option. In addition, the fees for attending classes are immense. There is also wastage of man-hours in travel. Even if a coaching institution is one of the best available, an average student from a remote area may not be able to join those due to many difficulties such as lodging and food expenses involved.

To overcome these difficulties, we at Exam Mottled have created our Exam Mottled Tester – an exam testing software with many advantages. If one compares benefit from our software with what today’s average coaching institution /books are giving, we have tremendous edge over these institutions.

Due to today’s exam structure and a deluge of knowledge around us , a prudent student will learn his/her basics at school/college and then directly use Exam Mottled Tester to practice at home , to ensure a steady and assured improvement in learning .
